title: Carbons derived from resole-type phenolic resins for use in lithium–sulfur batteries: templating the resins with sulfur leads to enhanced cell performance
content:
Energy Adv., 2024, 3,471-481
DOI: 10.1039/D3YA00481C, Paper
Open Access

Luke D. J. Barter, Irshad Mohammad, Steven J. Hinder, John F. Watts, Robert C. T. Slade, Carol Crean
Pyrolysed resole-type phenol-formaldehyde resins were used as carbonaceous sulfur-hosts in the cathodes of lithium–sulfur batteries.
